concept.title: The Intelligent Evidence Gathering Editor
concept.shortdesc: IEG scripts can be created and modified offline in an accessible manner.

conbody.p: The following sections outlines how a user with disabilities can create and modify IEG scripts in the administration application.

Before beginning, the user must have knowledge of the structure and definition of a IEG Script that is described in Working With Intelligent Evidence Gathering. For development outside of the online application an XML editor is required.
